products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: H | MONOMER,STYRENE & SOLVENT PUMP ROOM & TANK; H1 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection , testing & commissioning of Deluge valve with dry pilot trim assembly,fitted with strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, Pressure Switch, flame proof 3/2 way Solenoid Valve, air filter regulator etc. & manual release unit. The valve shall be electro-pneumatic double inter lock system as per scheme drawing. 80 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: assembly: dry pilot trim, included: strainer, included: drain valve, included: pressure gauge, included: pressure switch, included: flame proof 3/2 way solenoid valve, included: air filter regulator, included: manual release unit, system: electro-pneumatic double inter lock

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing & commissioning of CS Gate Valve as per API 600, class 150 with matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts. 80 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: cs(carbon steel), standard: api 600, class: 150, included: matching flanges, included: nuts & bolts

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: H | MONOMER,STYRENE & SOLVENT PUMP ROOM & TANK; H1 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply,installation,testing and commissioning of Foam Sprinkler nozzle with necessary threaded fittings as per drawing. The sprinkler shall be Open Aspiration, Pendent type, K-42 with standard spray angle.End connection 1/2" NPT/BSP.UL/FM Approved. Spray nozzle K factor -42
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: fittings: necessary threaded, type: open aspiration, type: pendent, k-factor: 42, spray angle: standard, end connection: 1/2" NPT/BSP, certification: UL(underwriters laboratories), certification: FM(factory mutual)

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: H | MONOMER,STYRENE & SOLVENT PUMP ROOM & TANK; H1 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of Foam bladder tank vertical type ,manufacturing as per ASME, section-VIII part- I. The bladder material shall be BUNA-N. The Bladder Tank shall be supplied along with all necessary valves, Hydraulically Operated Foam Concentrae Control Valve ,fittingss & instruments as per Technical data sheet attached with Tender documents. Capacity of 500 ltr.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: vertical, standard: ASME(american society of mechanical engineers) section-VIII part-I, bladder material: BUNA-N, included: all necessary valves, included: hydraulically operated foam concentrate control valve, included: fittings & instruments

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: H | MONOMER,STYRENE & SOLVENT PUMP ROOM & TANK; H1 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply of AR-AFFF(3%) foam concentrate(PFOS/PFAS free) having sp. Gravity 1.0±.02 g/mlat 20⁰C  , PH 7.0-8.5 & viscosity 1200 ±300 cps.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: AR-AFFF(3%) (aqueous film forming foam), feature: PFOS/PFAS free, specific gravity: 1.0±.02 g/ml at 20⁰C, pH: 7.0-8.5, viscosity: 1200 ±300 cps

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: H | MONOMER,STYRENE & SOLVENT PUMP ROOM & TANK; H1 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope. 100 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy, material: ms(black steel), standard: IS 1239 Part-1(indian standard), fittings: elbows, fittings: tees, fittings: flanges, fittings: reduces clamps, supports: MS support dash fasteners, coating: two coats of approved primer, coating: two coats of approved paint, joint: grooved with groove coupling, civil work: all related civil work, supports: vendor's scope

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: H | MONOMER,STYRENE & SOLVENT PUMP ROOM & TANK; H2 | FOAM GENERATOR
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications 150 NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: C (heavy class), standard: IS 1239(indian standard), fittings: threaded or grooved, included: elbow, included: tee, included: reducer, included: welding flanges, fixing: clamps to MS brackets/hangers, supports: steel, coating: zinc chromate primer, coating: 2 coats red enamel paint, application: above ground pipes, as per fire authorities requirement
